data.prayer: Please, convict the 257 believers in Tlemcen, Algeria to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tlemcen, Algeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Tlemcen, Algeria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 1468 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 257 believers in Tlemcen, Algeria a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Tlemcen, Algeria by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Tlemcen, Algeria.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Tlemcen, Algeria, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tlemcen, Algeria has a population of 377,400.

We estimate Tlemcen has 257 people who might know Jesus, 31 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 377,111 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,468 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Tlemcen be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.
